name: cloudflare-dynamic-dns
description: Updates a Cloudflare DNS address record with an IP address or hostname

scripts.build: npm run-script prod && npm run-script test-prod && npm run-script docs
scripts.dev: npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && tsc -p tsconfig.json --sourceMap
scripts.docs: npm run-script clean-docs && typedoc --mode file --module commonjs --out docs --target es5 --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.prod: npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test-dev: npm run-script clean-test && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json --sourceMap && mocha test/lib
scripts.test-prod: npm run-script clean-test && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && mocha test/lib
